name: Liketly Bar
author: Ketnooi

sections.description:
It is very light weight and doesn’t too many javascript codes, just give user option to share or follow!

  • This plugin will show LiketLy Bar on your website
  • Auto Post a LiketLy Update (Post title + Link) when you publish/update your WordPress blog.
  • Demo: Arowana Blog

If you have trouble on installation, please ask us at our WordPress support forum

Do you want to hire Quality Experts at WordPress?
Check out our service: WordPress Custom Development
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Register a www.Liket.ly profile.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to Appearance > Liketly Bar Configuration and insert your Liketly Username, API Token.
  5. Done.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free forever ?

Yes
